# documentState

**Instance Property**

The current state of the document.

## Declaration

```swift
var documentState: UIDocument.State { get }
```

## Discussion

When document state changes, the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument] object stores a constant identifying the new state in this property. See the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/State] enum for descriptions of these constants. To receive notifications about changes in document state, observe the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/stateChangedNotification] notification.

## Accessing document attributes

- **fileURL**: The file URL you use to initialize the document.
- **localizedName**: The localized name of the document.
- **fileType**: The file type of the document.
- **fileModificationDate**: The date and time your app last modified the document file.
- **progress**: The upload or download progress of a document.
